fields.name: DisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: Do any of the repairs exceed the required standard?﻿

fields.name: Showmessagetodisclaimer
fields.fieldText:
SAFETY IS IMPORTANT TO US


You acknowledge and accept that Autoglass® has attempted to carry out a repair to your damaged windscreen but that repair has failed to meet the requirements of British Standard AU 242b 2022 meaning that Autoglass® has not been able to carry out a successful repair to Your windscreen. In accordance with Our Terms of Business, Autoglass® explained and advised that a replacement windscreen is now required but you have withheld your authorisation for Autoglass® to carry out this work. You further understand and acknowledge that a failure and/or refusal to replace your windscreen constitutes a potential safety risk and therefore accept that this shall be at your own risk and Autoglass® shall have no further liability to you. If you would like to make an appointment to have Your windscreen replaced by Us in the future please book online at www.autoglass.co.uk and We will be happy to help You

fields.name: Wavier_Disclaimer
fields.fieldText: Wavier Disclaimer read to customer and repair has not met the standards
